issue.title: [CF 1475] Global Group Issue
issue.body:
All new Global Groups and all Groups set to Global will stack to the bottom center of the UI.

 

On attempt to reposition Global Group, they will all snap back to the previous position.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user LeoroxTheCursed | Imported from CurseForge issue #1475 | Raw

comments.body:
The Global Group Y and Y Offset can be changed but the icon will not move.


> Posted by CurseForge user LeoroxTheCursed

MoveAnything addon was interacting with TMW and causing the issue.

 

To fix it I went into MoveAnything and did a search for TellMeWhen, it returned TMW Groups that I reset and issue was FIXED.

 

Edited Mar 4, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user LeoroxTheCursed
